content: Two cells (a sperm and an egg) come together to form a new cell (the embryo), which replicates by division in geometric progression to form a human being, which has about 37 trillion cells.
translations: ita:Due cellule (uno spermatozoo e un ovulo) si uniscono per formare una nuova cellula (l'embrione), che si replica dividend
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
